mapper.sql: t.id, t.phoneNo, t.accountNo, /*t.pwd,*/ t.lock_cause lockCause, t.accountStatus, t.realName, t.nickName, t.qqNo, t.identityNo, t.sex, t.parentVipNo, t.bankCardNo1, t.bankCardNo2, t.bankCardNo3, /*t.payPwd,*/ t.createTime, t.account_remark accountRemark
mapper.select:
select lgInfo.login_ip loginIp, lgInfo.login_time loginTime, ipAddr.address addrStr, ifnull(t3.income_total, 0) onlineMoney, ifnull(t3.balance, 0) balance, ifnull(t3.recommend_money, 0) recommendMoney, ifnull(t3.freeze_money, 0) freezeMoney,
from tb_user_info t left join (select user_id, login_ip, max(login_time) login_time from tb_user_login_his group by user_id) lgInfo on t.id = lgInfo.user_id left join tb_addr_ipAddr ipAddr on ipAddr.ip = lgInfo.login_ip left join tb_user_income t3 on t3.user_id = t.id
and t.id like concat('%',#{params.id},'%')
and t.accountNo like concat('%',#{params.accountNo},'%')
and t.phoneNo like concat('%',#{params.phoneNo},'%')
and t.parentVipNo like concat('%',#{params.parentId},'%')
order by t.id asc

select t.id , t.user_id userId, t.login_ip loginIp, t.login_date loginDate, t.login_time loginTime, ipAddr.address loginAddr from tb_user_login_his t left join tb_addr_ipAddr ipAddr on ipAddr.ip = t.login_ip where t.user_id = #{userId} order by t.login_time desc

select ifnull(income.income_total, 0) onlineMoney, ifnull(income.balance, 0) balance, ifnull(income.recommend_money, 0) recommendMoney, ifnull(income.freeze_money, 0) freezeMoney, income.income_total onlineTime, t2.phone phoneCount, t2.password pwdCount, t2.pay_password payPwdCount, t3.sync_yunding syncYd, t3.sync_pwd syncPwd, t3.sync_pay_pwd syncPayPwd,
from tb_user_info t left join tb_user_income income on income.user_id = t.id left join tb_user_update_count t2 on t2.user_id = t.id left join tb_yd_vipInfo t3 on t3.vipNo = t.id where t.accountNo = #{accountNo}
select t.phone, t.password, t.pay_password payPassword from tb_user_update_count t where t.user_id = #{userId}
